author: jukka
msg: Big Picture: add DataStore, simplify the layout

author: markt
msg: When loading resources for XML schema validation, take account of the possibility that servlet-api.jar and jsp-api.jar may not be loaded by the same class loader.

author: dkulp
msg: Put a limit on the size of the output we record to limit memory usage for longer running tests that spit out a ton of info.

author: af
msg: 105491: Switched update of vertical flag and setting the item set to avoid infinite recursion.

author: markt
msg: Update JSTL JARs to 1.1.2 (same as Tomcat 7) with an svn cp from Tomcat 7.
Fixes various validation issues when using the examples web application with validation enabled.
